Wikipedia contains 5,836,035 pages.
There are a total of 462,630,385 links between Wikipedia pages.
8,655,302 Wikipedia pages are actually just redirects to other pages.
"List of current U.S. state legislators" is the Wikipedia page with the highest number of outgoing links (8,319).
"List of people from Illinois" is the Wikipedia page with the second highest number of outgoing links (8,081).
"List of least concern birds" is the Wikipedia page with the third highest number of outgoing links (7,896).
"List of stage names" is the Wikipedia page with the fourth highest number of outgoing links (6,733).
"List of film director and actor collaborations" is the Wikipedia page with the fifth highest number of outgoing links (6,704).
"Geographic coordinate system" is the most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,088,319 incoming links).
"International Standard Book Number" is the second most linked to page on Wikipedia (1,064,292 incoming links).
"WorldCat" is the third most linked to page on Wikipedia (548,639 incoming links).
"Virtual International Authority File" is the fourth most linked to page on Wikipedia (536,420 incoming links).
"United States" is the fifth most linked to page on Wikipedia (474,229 incoming links).

The last Wikipedia page title in alphabetical order is "ùïä".
354 Wikipedia pages (0.006% of all pages) have no incoming or outgoing links.
There are only 1,278 Wikipedia pages (0.02% of all pages) which link to no other pages.
There are 311,761 Wikipedia pages (5.34% of all pages) which are not linked to from any other page.
